alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:56PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow will impact portions of southeastern Dona Ana and northwestern El Paso Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow boundary along a line extending from San Miguel to Chamberino to Chaparral. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West El Paso, Northeast El Paso, Central El Paso, Chaparral, Santa Teresa, Anthony, Vado, Las Cruces, Sunland Park, Canutillo, Anthony Gap, Berino, NMSU Main Campus, Vinton, San Miguel, Westway, Mesquite, Chamberino, La Union and La Mesa. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 144 and 148, near mile marker 150, and between mile markers 158 and 164. Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 1 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
